channel.title: Is portfowarding required?
channel.description:
hi , right noobish question i know, but i was just woundering is required because i know how to do it..i used to owner a server afew years back.. but my routers password has been chanegd by the it guy and i canrt portforward at the moment... so if thiers another toute around it (not haamchi thats what im currently using) then please feel free to give me suggestion ..
p.s will some 1 view my post about adding donars prtal ect?

item.title: Is portfowarding required?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

You must portforward for people to login on your server.

Read full topic
